page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JOANNA.
page.content: My name is Joanna and I am ten years old.On wednesdays I normaly get up at half past seven when I hear the milking machine,which means dad is outside milking the cows,or mum awakes me.so we all get up and have breakfast like cornflakes,egg and bacon,toast and a cup of tea.Then my mother takes my 3 brothers and me to school and on the way we pick up a friend,Paul.We drop Francis and Paul at Cotton College before mum takes George,Michael and myself to Faber school on her way to work.The first lesson is table test in which I normaly get 33 out of forty.At half past three we go home.After tea I do any homework that needs to be done. At half past six we all go swimming at Waterhouses.We get home at eight p.m. then it is time to get ready for bed. Sometimes I may watch television or read a book before going to sleep.
